resources.name: list-tavus-personas
resources.title: List Tavus personas
resources.description: Lists all personas from Tavus. Supports filtering by type (user, system, Replica) and pagination.

resources.name: list-tavus-replicas
resources.title: List Tavus replicas
resources.description: Returns all replicas from Tavus. Supports filtering by replica type (user, system), verbosity, and pagination.
